snippet: A judge has placed two detainees recently released from the American prison at Guantánamo Bay under “judicial control,” which is a form of supervised parole.
abstract: Judge places Algerian men Nabil Hadjarab and Mutia Sadiq Ahmad Sayyab, two detainees recently released from Guantanamo Bay, under 'judicial control,' which is a form of supervised parole; treatment follows pattern for other Algerians released from Guantanamo.
lead_paragraph: A judge has placed two detainees recently released from the American prison at Guantánamo Bay under “judicial control,” which is a form of supervised parole.

headline.main: Algeria: Guantánamo Detainees Are Released Under Supervision
headline.print_headline: Algeria: Guantánamo Detainees Are Released Under Supervision
